title: Distorted worldview
excerpt: Most of the challenges we create for ourselves are the result of what we don't or can't see.

children.text: Most of the challenges we create for ourselves are the result of what we don't or can't see.
The opportunities we missed. The failures we didn't anticipate. The stuff in the periphery of our lives so often overlooked.
It's not because we’re stupid. But it is because we’re biased. Shaped by a whirlwind of experiences hitherto unseen.
Suffice to say, learning to see more of what we don't know we can't see is an invaluable skill, indeed.
